mapper.select: select ct.*,e.employeeName,cm.companyName from ems.employee e, ems.contract ct, ems.company cm where ct.status = '1' and ct.employeeID = e.employeeID and ct.companyID = cm.companyID and ct.employeeID = #{employeeID}
